## Shiny apps

```{r include=FALSE}
library(gt)
library(dplyr)

project_table <- dplyr::tribble(
  ~Name, ~Description,
  "[NameguessR](https://nameguessr.herokuapp.com/)", "A game where you guess a person's nationality from their name.",
  "[Barcelona house price explorer](https://danielbanki.shinyapps.io/barcelona-house-prices-explorer/)", "An interactive app to visualise house prices in Barcelona."
  
)
```


```{r echo=FALSE}
project_table %>% 
  knitr::kable()

```
